messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Ishin Players Needed
messages.msgSnippet: We even need the behind the scenes guys like Matsudaira Katamori and his brother who was in charge of the Shoshidai, we can use the Mimiwarigumi to heckle the
messages.messageBody:
We even need the "behind the scenes guys like Matsudaira Katamori and
his brother who was in charge of the Shoshidai, we can use the
Mimiwarigumi to heckle the Shinsengumi etc.Live out your wildest fantasy
by being Kondou's mistress or the party girl who keeps running away from
Saitou LOL


--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Ishin Players Needed
messages.msgSnippet: We have several people now playing major roles in the Shinsengumi RPG. However there are still several Captains and other fairly well- known members who are
messages.messageBody:
We have several people now playing major roles in the Shinsengumi
RPG. However there are still several Captains and other fairly well-
known members who are still available, among them Harada Sanosuke
(surprisingly). And so far NO ONE has volunteered to be part of the
Ishin! Not even a taker from the RK folks for Hitokiri Battousai!

Alright folks, we know some of you out there have got to want to
play! No need to worry if you're holding out because you don't
consider yourself to be "knowledgeable" enough about the Shinsengumi.
We're not following exact history here. In fact, history has pretty
much alreay gone out the window! Just the basics you've picked up
from here and by watching RK and PMK will do. That's really all you
need to know. And the game isn't all that time consuming either. I'm
involved with another RPG and I'm not having to devote nearly the
time I originally feared to it. We all have lives to lead off the
internet after all.

If you want to check out the community later (once the game has
started, which it has not yet) the url is:
http:/www.livejournal.com/community/miburo_lair

Come on folks! We can't have all cowboys and no indians! Someone
needs to take on the roles of Katsura, Takasugi, Sakamoto, Saigo,
Okubo, the four hitokiri, Yoshida. We're even accepting Hitokiri
Battousai (further proof history has long since been disregarded).
Doesn't anyone want to be the bad guys? Or is that the good guys? LOL!

So far the list of taken characters is:

Hijikata - MissBehavin
Ito - Barb
Suzuki (Miki) - Phil
Saitou - Angrybee
Kondou - Wounds
Okita - Aurus
Nagakura - Masayoshi
Ayunee - Sherlgirl
Yamanami - Tama
Takeda - Sanada

All others are up for grabs.

-MissBehavin aka Toshizo Hijikata
